title: PBE Installation/ Update Help
body: I just got approved for the PBE and went to install the client. It popped up with the 0.82 version and said to download league. Tried that and it just opened regular client. Tried Hextech repair tool and accidentaly deleted my original client patch. now I'm stuck re downloading that and have no idea how to get it to DL on the PBE client. any help would be appreciated.

replies.body: That's pretty weird that the PBE installer popped open the normal client. Make sure you're using [**this link**](https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en_US/pbe) to grab the actual PBE installer and run that as admin!
You helped me out **THANK YOU** SOOOO MUCH!!!!

no prob, I was sooo frustrated for a bit, wondering if I messed it up somehow. luckily I just kept trying different stuff and finally realized that the link they had at the top of the  PBE page was messed up. Glad you could figure it out, and have fun with the 8000 RP they give u EVERY DAY

hey yea I'm not sure what happened but I did end up finding it on the boards. The thing that is weird is it showed like version .82 or something of the pbe client, and there was only a button that would make me dl the new , normal client? I think I used the link at the top of the pbe site, so not sure if that needs to be updated or something. but thanks for the reply.

Hey, what did you do? 
I have the same problem
Go to this site and download the PBE Client https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en_US/pbe
